document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Trout Bay Project in North America dated July 2006
document.description: A National Instrument 43-101 compliant technical report prepared by Caracle Creek International Consulting Inc. for the Trout Bay Property near Red Lake, Ontario, owned by Goldcorp Inc. and optioned by Band-Ore.
